description:
On deleting a VM there was a traceback trying to make an IPAddress out of None -- in this case subnet['cidr'] didn't contain anything.  If the subnet doesn't have a cidr we can just take it from the network_ref.

Review here: https://review.openstack.org/#change,2266,patchset=1
title: Don't barf if the subnet doesn't have a cidr set

comments.content:
On deleting a VM there was a traceback trying to make an IPAddress out of None -- in this case subnet['cidr'] didn't contain anything.  If the subnet doesn't have a cidr we can just take it from the network_ref.

Review here: https://review.openstack.org/#change,2266,patchset=1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bgh
